articles.author: Sneha Kulkarni
articles.title: Senior citizens get 8.10% interest in this FD; see the list of banks offering highest interest rates on 5-year fixed deposits
articles.description: Senior citizens in India can now secure fixed deposit interest rates as high as 8.10% for a 5-year tenure, primarily offered by small finance banks. These competitive returns are available on deposits up to Rs 3 crore, subject to TDS. While small finance bank…
articles.content: Senior citizens in India are getting fixed deposit (FD) interest rates as high as 8.10% for a 5-year tenure. These rates are primarily offered by small finance banks, which continue to lead the marke… [+3616 chars]
